/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with a variety of buildings, each with its own unique architectural style. On the left side of the street, traditional Chinese buildings stand tall, their curved roofs and ornate details showcasing the city's rich history and culture. In contrast, the right side of the street is dominated by modern skyscrapers, their sleek lines and glass facades reflecting the city's rapid urban development.

The street itself is a hive of activity. Cars and motorcycles fill the road, weaving their way through the city's arteries. Pedestrians can be seen strolling along the sidewalk, adding a human element to the urban landscape. The sky above is a clear blue, providing a vibrant backdrop to the cityscape.
